channel.title: Help with server
channel.description: i set up my server i did the port forward i did no ip but whenever i use the no ip in moparscape it doesent woerk whats the ip i give people to use my server?

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

if u can play on local…
than it has to be something with port forwarding…
r u sure u did it right
and do u have portforwarding turned on?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server

item.description:

im still assuming invalid port :]

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @pistondude642 pistondude642
item.description:
@pistondude642 wrote:

[quote=“Lexii, post:11, topic:180487”]if the no-ip works…
then ur good to go
just tell sum1 to log onto it
try posting ur server at the server status page
if it doesnt work
then u need to change ur server port to 43594…
or just change the port that u r logging in with[/quote]my no ip is projecthalo.no-ip.org i cant get it to work? u can try

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @Lexii Lexii
item.description:
@Lexii wrote:

if the no-ip works…
then ur good to go
just tell sum1 to log onto it
try posting ur server at the server status page
if it doesnt work
then u need to change ur server port to 43594…
or just change the port that u r logging in with

Read full topic
